hibernate-mapping.query: from Contrato as contrato where contrato.colaborador = :colaborador and contrato.statusObjeto = 'ATIVO' order by servico.nome, id
from Contrato as contrato where contrato.servico = :servico and contrato.statusObjeto = 'ATIVO' order by contrato.servico.nome, id
from Contrato as cont where cont.statusObjeto = 'ATIVO' and cont.servico = :servico and cont.colaborador = :colaborador
